Text: Great stuff Nep. I've said it once and I'll say it again...but your a fucking life savour. If it wasn't for you I would have to wait until Monday to see any football - and even then they are only airing 2 games. Love your work my man!
Thanks Nepotu as always great work bro:)
You're welcome my friends! Your words make me happy! Enjoy it!
I have never left a comment on a torrent before, and I created an account here just to say thank you. With my new work schedule, I had no way of catching Ravens games. I can't thank you enough.
Thank you my friend, for your kind words! I like to make people happy. Cheers to all of you!
I've said it before, I pay to watch these games but I can't do it whilst travelling. Thanks to you I can!
